title: Performance appraisals: Right metrics can help more firms embrace flexible work arrangements
title_page: Performance appraisals: Right metrics can help more firms embrace flexible work arrangements | The Straits Times
maintext:
The pronouncement that Covid-19 no longer poses a global health emergency by the World Health Organisation this week comes with huge implications, including whether more employers will expect employees to head back to the office full-time.
Perhaps the reality is that after a sudden leap into full remote work precipitated by a global pandemic, the return to workplaces was always going to be inevitable. But we should expect a coming tug-of-war.
